snippet: This has been the crossover year for Big Data - as a concept, as a term and, yes, as a marketing tool. Big Data has sprung from the confines of technology circles into the mainstream, reports Steve Lohr in Sunday's New York Times.
abstract: This has been the crossover year for Big Data - as a concept, as a term and, yes, as a marketing tool. Big Data has sprung from the confines of technology circles into the mainstream, reports Steve Lohr in Sunday's New York Times.

headline.main: Unboxed: How Big Data Became So Big
